1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Short sign.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Short
7  ( -- * Data type
8    Short (..), ShortDef,
9  
10    -- * Utility
11    shortTrim, shortM, shortListM,
12    shortGroup,
13  
14    -- * Shorten
15    shortText,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Data.List                                as L
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.AngleText  as S
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Next       as S
22
23
24-- ----------------------  Data type
25
26-- | Something with short definition.
27data Short a =
28    Short { shortSource :: [B.CodePt]
29          , shortHead   :: [ShortDef]
30          , shortBody   :: a }
31    deriving (Show, Ord, Eq)
32
33-- | Short prefix and replacement.
34type ShortDef = B.Named String
35
36instance Functor Short where
37    fmap f (Short pt he bo) = Short pt he $ f bo
38
39shortTrim :: B.Map [Short [a]]
40shortTrim = B.omit $ null . shortBody
41
42shortM :: (Monad m) => Short (m a) -> m (Short a)
43shortM (Short pt he bo) = return . Short pt he =<< bo
44
45shortListM :: (Monad m) => [Short (m a)] -> m [Short a]
46shortListM = mapM shortM
47
48shortGroup :: [Short a] -> [Short [a]]
49shortGroup [] = []
50shortGroup (Short cp1 sh1 a : xs) =
51    case shortGroup xs of
52      Short _ sh2 as : xs' | sh1 == sh2  -> Short cp1 sh1 (a:as) : xs'
53      []                                 -> [Short cp1 sh1 [a]]
54      xs'                                -> Short cp1 sh1 [a] : xs'
55
56
57-- ----------------------  Shorten
58
59-- | String shortener.
60shortText :: [ShortDef] -> B.Shorten
61shortText = loop . reverse . B.sortWith len where
62    len = length . snd
63
64    loop [] _ = Nothing
65    loop ((prefix, replace) : sh) s =
66        case L.stripPrefix replace s of
67          Just s2             -> Just $ prefix ++ "." ++ text2 s2
68          _                   -> loop sh s
69
70    text2 s   | isGeneralText s   = s
71              | otherwise         = S.angleQuote s
72
73-- | Test string is general sign.
74isGeneralText :: B.Pred String
75isGeneralText = all S.isGeneralChar
76
